// https://redux-toolkit.js.org/usage/usage-guide#simplifying-slices-with-createslice
import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";const initialState={mode:"light"};export const appSlice=createSlice({name:"app",initialState,reducers:{setMode:(state,action)=>{state.mode=action.payload;}}});export const selectMode=state=>state.app.mode;export const{setMode}=appSlice.actions;export default appSlice.reducer;
